sub_title: Technical editor EN > DE at Maruboshi Europe B.V.
summary: I am currently employed as an in-house technical translator. My native languages are English and German, my working languages also include French and Spanish. My areas of expertise are science and technology, particularly texts related to the automotive industry, and information technology.
